    • Uses of Strategy in project.strategy

      Classes in project.strategy that implement Strategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Basic
      This class represent the basis strategy player type.
      class  BasicStrategy
      This abstract class represent the basis strategy player type.
      class  Greed
      This class represent the concrete class for the greedy player strategy, greedy player
      always try to get more lantern cards, and to make dedication, so greedy player
      tries to choose a solution, which can get it more lantern cards and favor tokens.
      class  GreedyStrategy
      This class represent the abstract class for greedy player strategy class,
      the greedy player always makes the move which will bring the best immediate
      return (i.e.
      class  Human
      This class is a concrete class for Human strategy player type.
      class  HumanStrategy
      This class represent the abstract class of the Human strategy player type.
      class  Random
      This class represent the concrete class of a random strategy player.
      class  RandomStrategy
      This class represent the abstract class for the random strategy player.
      class  Unfriendliness
      This class represent the concrete class for the unfriendly player strategy type,
      Unfriendly player selects an option to place a lake tile, which does not give any
      Opponent player a lantern card to make a dedication.
      class  UnfriendlyStrategy
      This class represent the abstract class for the unfriendly player strategy class.
      the unfriendly player always makes a move which will bring the most harm to one
      or more opponents (i.e.
